EmailTemplate.name: Service Manager Assign Boat Specialist Retail Boat ERP
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Retail Boat ERP has been Created. Please assign a Boat Specialist.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Click here to go direct to the ERP.
The moment you assign a Boat Specialist, that Boat Specialist will receive a Task in Salesforce to gather the parts necessary.
Please have the Boat Specialist mark Tasks as complete when the parts are gathered. This can allow for tracking by Service Managers.
